channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AZ

item.title: Report X-2024020151
item.description:
Report X-2024020151

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-12T18:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-01
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2024020151 RESPONDER RECIEVED CALL TO UNLOAD, PICKED UP LEAKING PACKAGE, PLACED SAID PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY FOR TRANSPORT. TRANSPORTED SAID PACKAGE TO DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. 2. X-2024020152 RESPONDER RECEIVED A CALL TO THE UNLOAD WALL FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE, UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER IDENTIFIED SAID LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER PLACED PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY. TRANSPORTED LEAKING PACKAGE TO DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL
